org.integratedmodelling.thinklab.api.modelling
Interface IState

All Superinterfaces:
IConceptualizable, IIndirectObservation, IInstanceImplementation, IMetadataHolder, IObservation
All Known Subinterfaces:
IExtent
public interface IState
extends IIndirectObservation, IConceptualizable, IInstanceImplementation

A State is an observation resulting from the contextualization of a stateful observation. It can conceptualize back to the semantic annotation for the observation it represents. States are the only type of observation that is stored in KBoxes, and have either an external datasource or an inline state. States must always have explicit extents; if a state has no extents, it must be a constant.

Author:
Ferdinando

Method Detail

getValue

java.lang.Object getValue(int offset)
Return the unmodified object at given offset. Most times it will be a duplicate of super.getValue(offset, parameters) but should not make any modification. If data are unknown (nodata), return null.

Parameters:
previousOffset -
Returns:

getRawData

java.lang.Object getRawData()
This will return an array of the appropriate type without any further allocation. It's terrifying to use in Java, but just fine for dynamically typed embedded languages.

Returns:

getDataAsDoubles

double[] getDataAsDoubles()
                          throws ThinklabValidationException
Should endeavor to return doubles as long as it's not entirely meaningless. Many procedures will require doubles and the more are supported, the more can be done with all scientific plugins.

Returns:
Throws:
ThinklabValidationException

aggregate

IState aggregate(IConcept concept)
                 throws ThinklabException
Return a state with the given context dimension collapsed to one, and the data appropriately aggregated. Return self if the dimension is not in the context and throw an exception if data along that dimension cannot be aggregated. It's expected to handle the metadata appropriately, e.g. modify the units if necessary.

Parameters:
concept -
Returns:
Throws:
ThinklabException

isSpatiallyDistributed

boolean isSpatiallyDistributed()
